class.name: object_locator/DisparityStage
class.description: This nodelet calculates disparity given a stereo pair.

class.name: object_locator/SAMStage
class.description: This nodelet does simultaneous acquisiton of objects based on a cascaded trained model.

class.name: object_locator/SyncStage
class.description: This nodelet creates a synced stereo pair to process.

class.name: object_locator/BOOMStage
class.description: This nodelet processes the median,normalize, and blob detect filter for the boom cameras.
